00049 //
00050 // DateParse
00051 //
00052 // 13 April 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_DATEPARSE_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_DATEPARSE_HPP
00057 
00058 class DateParse {
00059 private:
00060   static int _parseYear( const std::string& year ) {
00061     return atoi( year.c_str() );
00062   }
00063 
00064   static int _parseDay( const std::string& day ) {
00065     return atoi( day.c_str() );
00066   }
00067 
00068   static int _parseMonth( const std::string& month ) {
00069     if( month[0] >= '0' && month[0] <= '9' )
00070       return atoi( month.c_str() );
00071 
00072     char prefix[4];
00073     memset( prefix, 0, 4 );
00074 
00075     for( unsigned int i=0; i<4 && i<month.size(); i++ ) {
00076       prefix[i] = tolower( month[i] );
00077     }
00078     
00079     // j f m a m j j a s o n d
00080     if( prefix[0] == 'j' ) {
00081       if( prefix[1] == 'a' ) return 1; // january
00082       if( prefix[2] == 'n' ) return 6; // june
00083       if( prefix[2] == 'l' ) return 7; // july
00084       return 0;
00085     } else if( prefix[0] == 'f' ) {
00086       return 2; // february
00087     } else if( prefix[0] == 'a' ) {
00088       if( prefix[1] == 'p' ) return 4; // april
00089       if( prefix[1] == 'u' ) return 8; // august
00090       return 0;
00091     } else if( prefix[0] == 'm' ) {
00092       if( prefix[2] == 'r' ) return 3; // march
00093       if( prefix[2] == 'y' ) return 5; // may
00094       return 0;
00095     } else if( prefix[0] == 's' ) {
00096       return 9; // september
00097     } else if( prefix[0] == 'o' ) {
00098       return 10; // october
00099     } else if( prefix[0] == 'n' ) {
00100       return 11; // november
00101     } else if( prefix[0] == 'd' ) {
00102       return 12;
00103     }
00104 
00105     return 0;
00106   }
00107 
00108 public:
00109   // converts year, month, and day from parser to the number of days since 1600
00110   static UINT64 convertDate( const std::string& year, const std::string& month, const std::string& day ) {
00111     int numYear = _parseYear( year );
00112     int numMonth = _parseMonth( month );
00113     int numDay = _parseDay( day );
00114 
00115     int monthCumulativeDays[] = { 0, 31, 59, 90, 120, 151, 181, 212, 243, 273, 304, 334 };
00116     if( numMonth == 0 || numYear < 1601 || numDay == 0 )
00117       return 0;
00118 
00119     // let's do days since 1600 here
00120     UINT64 totalDays = 0;
00121     UINT64 yearsSince = numYear - 1600;
00122     
00123     // every 4 years is a leap year, except every 100 years is not, except every 400 years actually is...
00124     UINT64 leapDays = yearsSince / 4 -
00125                       yearsSince / 100 +
00126                       yearsSince / 400 + 
00127                       1; // 1 leap day in 1600
00128 
00129     // if this year is a leap year and it's past febuary, add an extra year on
00130     if( numMonth > 2 && (numYear % 4) == 0 && ( ((numYear % 100) != 0) || (numYear % 400) == 0) )
00131       leapDays++;
00132 
00133     return (numDay-1) + monthCumulativeDays[numMonth-1] + yearsSince*365 + leapDays;
00134   }
00135 };
00136 
00137 #endif // INDRI_DATEPARSE_HPP
